reviewText:
Includes 6 VHS': PowerPoint 97, Access 97, Excel 97, Word 97, Outlook 97, and Windows 95.

- These might not be the latest versions but they go through all the basics.
- It's the teach yourself series. You can watch straight through to see what you still don't know, or you can watch it in segments and practice, before going onto the next chapter/section on each tape.

-No more trial and error to figure things out.
-For the price, this will save you lots of time since it gives loads of shortcuts.
-It's presented in a clear and easy to understand format.

Was very helpful.
